FuncDef: This command monitors arbiter statistics for a subscriber.
CLIs: subscriber <sub-ident-string> [ arbiter { root | <name> } ] [ ingress | egress ] [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an existing subscriber identification policy name, up to 32 characters in length.
Specifies the name of the policer control policy arbiter.
Specifies the arbiter to which this queue would be feeding.
Displays arbiter name statistics applied on the ingress SAP.
Displays arbiter name statistics applied on the egress SAP.
Configures the interval for each display in seconds. Values-11 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 11 seconds
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic instead of the delta.
